attributes.action: Birth/Death certificates for babies lost before 24wks of pregnancy
attributes.additional_details: After delivering our babies we are refused a birth and death certificate due to our babies gestation, I lost my son at 20wks of pregnancy not being able to register them is hard, even more so after seeing how perfectly formed they where at this gestation of pregnancy.It is our strong belief that parents who have lost baby's before 24wks should be given the option to have these documents after loosing a much wanted baby We feel that if given this we are able to prove our babies did exist.
attributes.background:
Women who give birth to a baby prior to 24 weeks are unable to register the death or birth of their babies. Please help us get the law changed so babies can be registered when they die.
Angel baby Amin's pregnancy loss support group private page 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/1762271017384071/

rejection.details:
We are sorry for your loss. You may wish to sign this existing petition on this issue as you are more likely to get action if you sign and share a single petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/187027
